info.desc: (N)ot (Q)uite (B)env - (P)ython, Gen2: is multi-host build engine for C/C++

current.comment: 1. Add STM32 toolchains. 2. Add ninja executables to the repo. 3. add ability to invoke the ninja 'deps' tool. 4. Add support to clean 'legacy' derived object when migrating to NQBP2

history.comment: 1. Add missing header paths to the PI Pico toolchains. 2. Update documentation
Add toolchain for RP2040-Wireless. Update Windows Host toolchains to use response files (to avoid 8K Windoze limit)
initial version (most (but not all) toolchains have been verified)
